statements: SELECT * FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices;
SELECT celebrity_name, outfit_description FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE event_type = 'Red Carpet';
SELECT id, celebrity_name FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices ORDER BY date_of_event DESC;
SELECT * FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE id < 5;
SELECT celebrity_name, event_type FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE date_of_event >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT celebrity_name, event_type FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE date_of_event = '2022-10-15';
SELECT outfit_description, celebrity_name FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE event_type = 'Gala' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT celebrity_name, event_type, date_of_event FROM Celejson_namebritiesFashionChoices WHERE event_type IN ('Red Carpet', 'Fashion Show') ORDER BY date_of_event ASC;
SELECT * FROM CelebritiesFashionChoices WHERE outfit_description LIKE '%glitter%' AND event_type = 'Party';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities
SELECT Name, Event FROM Celebrities
SELECT Name, Event, Outfit FROM Celebrities WHERE Event='Red Carpet'
SELECT * FROM Events
SELECT EventName, Date, Location FROM Events WHERE Date='2022-01-01'
SELECT Name, Event FROM Celebrities WHERE Outfit = 'Gown';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE Event = 'Awards' ORDER BY Name DESC;
SELECT EventName, Location FROM Events WHERE Date >= '2021-10-01' AND Date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE Name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT Name, Event FROM Celebrities WHERE Name IN ('Jennifer', 'Brad') ORDER BY Name ASC, Event DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT celebrity_id, name, age FROM Celebrities ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT event_name, location, date FROM Events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT outfit_id, outfit_description, designer FROM Outfits WHERE designer LIKE '%Valentino%';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities INNER JOIN Outfits ON Celebrities.celebrity_id = Outfits.celebrity_id;
SELECT celebrity_id, name, age FROM Celebrities;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT event_name, date FROM Events ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, profession FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Outfits JOIN Celebrities ON Outfits.celebrity_id = Celebrities.celebrity_id WHERE Celebrities.profession = 'Actor';
SELECT * FROM award_shows;
SELECT celebrity_name, outfit_description FROM award_shows WHERE id = 1;
SELECT celebrity_name, event_date FROM premieres ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT celebrity_name, outfit_color FROM red_carpet WHERE event_type = 'Gala';
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers WHERE specialty LIKE '%evening wear%';
SELECT * FROM award_shows WHERE celebrity_name = 'Jennifer Lawrence' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT celebrity_name, outfit_description FROM award_shows WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT celebrity_name, designer, premiere_location FROM premieres WHERE event_date = '2022-09-10';
SELECT celebrity_name, outfit_color FROM red_carpet WHERE event_type = 'Gala' ORDER BY celebrity_name ASC;
SELECT celebrity_name, specialty FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_name LIKE '%Versace%';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, occupation FROM Celebrities WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT outfit_name, price FROM Outfits WHERE price < 100.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_type = 'Fashion Show';

SELECT c.name AS celebrity_name, o.outfit_name AS outfit_name, e.event_name AS event_name FROM Celebrities c JOIN CelebOutfit co ON c.celebrity_id = co.celebrity_id JOIN Outfits o ON co.outfit_id = o.outfit_id JOIN Events e ON co.event_id = e.event_id;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, gender, age FROM Celebrities WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT celebrity_id, name, occupation FROM Celebrities ORDER BY occupation ASC, name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_type = 'Gala' ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT c.name AS celebrity_name, o.outfit_name AS outfit_name, e.event_name AS event_name FROM Celebrities c JOIN CelebOutfit co ON c.celebrity_id = co.celebrity_id JOIN Outfits o ON co.outfit_id = o.outfit_id JOIN Events e ON co.event_id = e.event_id WHERE co.event_id = 2;
